rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: I say ‘potential’ because we have not had a respiratory transmitted virus case yet in the U.S. The second thing is just looking at the epidemiology: Are there people who are in contact with potential cases? So I think that [looking at the epidemiology] will be important.
